DOC.brief_summary: This study examine effect dietary intervention post-treatment head neck cancer survivor ability function physically , tiredness , quality life , well change marker blood associate good recurrence survival .
DOC.brief_title: Diet Intervention , Head Neck Cancer , Feasibility
DOC.criteria: Patients eligible participate 1 ) diagnose Stage I IV oral , hypopharyngeal , nasopharyngeal , oropharyngeal , laryngeal cancer ; 2 ) age 19+ ; 3 ) least 6 month 2 year posttreatment ; 4 ) able consume food orally ; 5 ) evidence disease ; 6 ) Englishspeaking Patients eligible participate 1 ) dementia organic brain syndrome ; 2 ) severe emotional distress ; 3 ) active schizophrenia ; 3 ) another diagnosis cancer past five year ( include skin cervical cancer situ )
